title: The 2007 CIA World Factbook
author: United States. Central Intelligence Agency
excerpt: This Project Gutenberg eBook is rather large, so is
content:
This Project Gutenberg eBook is rather large, so is
distributed in several pieces.

This file:
  27348-README.txt

The text: 
  27348-0.txt

All three image subdirectories together in a zip file:
  27348-images.zip

If you want all images plus the text, you will
probably want these two files:
  27348-0.txt
  27348-images.zip

New original cover art included with this eBook is granted to the public domain.

===========================================

The files in the \maps and \flags folders
are named by their country's two-character
FIPS-10 code.  

For more information, or if a country 
appears to be missing, refer to the 
Factbook's Appendix D - Cross Reference 
List of Country Data Codes.

There are two lists below, the first sorted
by country name, the second sorted by
country code.
